title: Secure Apartment to Paris
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


This apartment looks onto an inner court and is located on the 2nd floor (with elevator) of a superb 19th century building that has been completely redone.

Once across the magnificent entrance hall, you shall feel immediately seduced by the peace and quiet that can be felt all around your living quarters.

Inside, traditional Haussmanian charm has been preserved and combined with very modern furniture.

This harmonious blend manages to create a cozy and refined atmosphere.

The living room has a superb sofa bed (Queen size, sleeps two) where you will be able to lay back and enjoy the state of the art flat screen TV or surf the net thanks to the wireless internet connection placed at your entire disposal. The American style kitchen found next to the living room is completely equipped and will allow you to put your cooking skills to the test on some French cuisine.

In front of the living room is the bedroom, with a Queen size bed (160 cm) for your utmost comfort. You will also be able to enjoy an LCD TV placed in this room.

Lastly, the bathroom has been cleverly placed at the other end of the apartment and is equipped with a superb Italian shower, perfect for a tonic wake-up right before going out to a great day of sightseeing.

This apartment offers guests an ideal location and high class commodities for an unforgettable Paris stay!
